column4: Can someone please advise, I have a non critical Edgy install, can I upgrade to the new Feisty beta or should I do a clean install
for noncritical, go for an updgrade
hybrid , thanks, will this complicate things once I want to upgrade to final release next month ?
well, it is a beta ;) but no, there should be no problems
:-) beta warning noted. final question should I donwload the alternative iso or just change sources and dist-upgrade ?
you have desktop and want alternative?
?? I installed Edgy from a Desktop CD, I thought I need alternate for upgrade
oh, well no. 'alternative' is a variant, just like 'desktop' and 'server'
so, if you have 'desktop', don't bother with any 'alternative' stuff
oh my bad, must have picked up the wrong info back when upgrading from 5.10 to 6.06 or something...so should I download the Desktop ISO or go with dist-upgrade by changing sources ?
there are more things that can go wrong on an upgrade, so if you want to be as safe as possible, go for the cd
to be sure 1. Download desktop ISO and boot from it 2. It will allow to upgrade my current Edgy ?
nope, upgrading is done with an app, hang on Ill give you link
one of the forums says just do: gksu "upgrade-manager -c -d"
thanks for your assist, starting upgrade
